title: REFERENCED DOCUMENTS
fullText:
The following documents are referred to in this Standard:
AS/NZS
3823	Performance of electrical appliances—Air conditioners and heat pumps
3823.2	Part 2:	Energy labelling and minimum energy performance standard (MEPS) requirements
4509	Stand-alone power systems
4509.1	Part 1:	Safety and installation
4536	Life cycle costing—An application guide
5033	Installation of photovoltaic (PV) arrays
IEC
61836	Solar photovoltaic energy systems—Terms and symbols
NZS
4219	Seismic performance of engineering systems in buildings
6808	Acoustics—The assessment and measurement of sound from wind turbine generators
